info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:43AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN POLK...NORTHEASTERN GREENVILLE AND NORTHWESTERN SPARTANBURG COUNTIES UNTIL 130 AM EDT... At 1242 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Columbus, or near Landrum, moving south at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Columbus, Landrum, Inman, Tryon, Campobello, Lake Bowen, Tigerville, Lake Robinson, Gowensville and Green Creek. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: The combination of gusty winds and saturated soil conditions will cause scattered trees and power lines to fall. Seek shelter inside an interior room.
